page.title: 11Pastimes and Pursuits
page.content: Amberley as an area of outstanding beauty lends itself to outdoor activities. There are a number of small clubs to suit all tastes and ages in the vicinity. Sport is very popular with local football, cricket and stoolball clubs;fishing on the river Arun. Camping and walking along the South Downs Way and the many footpaths traversing the area. Riding and gliding are also enjoyed. All houses have gardens from which produce is exhibited in the local shows. Craftwork classes are held locally for painting, pottery, spinning,etc. A travelling library is available weekly. Fund raising events , coffee mornings, and sales are held.
